## Deployment Configuration

### Template Tier
- [ ] **Starter** - Basic project management (up to 5 projects, 2 team members)
- [ ] **Professional** - Advanced features (up to 25 projects, 10 team members)
- [ ] **Enterprise** - Full suite with integrations (unlimited projects/team members)
